title: Battleground Pennsylvania To Play Pivotal Role In Midterms

media:group.media:title: Battleground Pennsylvania To Play Pivotal Role In Midterms
media:group.media:description:
The Hill traveled across Pennsylvania ahead of Election Day to get a sense of what issues voters were most concerned about in the state that is seen as a microcosm of the country.

Republicans, including Oz, have zeroed in on rising crime rates and inflation in the closing days of the campaign. Democrats, like Fetterman, have also addressed economic issues while also talking about abortion access as the main part of their campaign platform.
